name: Saiyan Ultra Xenoverse
description:
"Saiyan Ultra Xenoverse" is a turn-based card game themed on the alien world. Unique character collection and field exploration are the core features of the game, and the real-time ranked arena is full of unknown challenges. There are unique features such as gear collection, elemental trial, and world boss, hurry up and explore the world together!

[Game Features]
Brand-new Model, Unique Development
The game introduced a brand new exploration feature, plus a unique card development mode. It brings a brand new experience, and also allows you to gain a unique sense of accomplishment during the development process.

Diverse Features, Unlimited Fun
World Boss, ranked arena, gear collection, and element trial and other special features. Enriched game experience balances the needs of PVE and PVP.

Full Screen Burst, Unlimited Combo
The extremely spectacular images in the alien world, the full-screen ultimate and the free combat mode will bring you with an unprecedented refreshing and intense combat experience. Come and experience it together!
